content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
Since jan. 03, 2012, extraterrestrial space orbs have been making grids over fisk pond/lake cochituate, route 135, natick, mass. u.S.A. they can be observed between dusk and dawn, and can be seen with the naked eye, although binoculars will allow one to see the lines, and other craft more clearly. the grids fly at between five and ten mile altitudes.
    for over a year no one has reported these on-going events. may be for good reason.
    also since the vatican has revealed alien activity seen from their arizona observatory, it may be time for the u.S. government to do so as well.
    it is difficult to tell about these events because they are nightly , and anyone can report them, but none have.
      end of message.
content.summary: Many ongoing events see below.

content.detailedDescription: I was asleep in my bedroom around 3 am , then i was woken up by a loud noise it sounded like a real heavy rain, like a storm, but there was no rain at all  so i looked outside my window and there it was a big bright light, it looked just like a sparkler, like the ones you buy at the fireworks store, just very loud and bigger, after i looked at it for a few seconds, i got dressed and went outside to see what that was it did not take me but a minute to go outside and the object was gone, after that i went to sleep the next day i looked at the grass and it looked dead,i like to know if this is something anyone has encounter before,i seen a ufo before but nothing like this.
content.summary: very similar to the sparklers, but real big

content.detailedDescription:
I was at somerset national forest near bennington,vt.I was sitting in a chair watching the sun come up.I was waiting for my friend to wake up to go fishing.Across the road over a river i noticed the objects.They were hovering over the river just a stones throw away.They would move up and down and side ways.I sat there for about a half hour untill i realized i should take some pictures.I reached in the camper and grabed my camera and sat back down in my chair and started to take pictures.I took maybe 20 pictures and then got up and walked to the edge of the river and took more pictures.I have zoom on my camera and many pictures are of when i zoomed.At one point one of then raised up a little and came in my direction.I got the feeling it was looking me over.I heard no noise and saw no fumes or emissions.I was not scared at all just curious.They were not threating in any manner.In all i took about 38 pictures.I will post 6 pictures here.If you want to see all of them i would glady send them to you.At one point i did not believe they were real.I thought maybe they were cobwebs and the sun was reflecfing off the strands of the web???I do not know.I hope you people can tell what they were.I gave you my cell phone number i do not have a landphone.I am 68 years andi am  not use to cell phones.Sometimes i can not even hear it ring but if you want more info or anything keep calling me or e-mail me.In all i saw them about a hour.My friend slept threw the wole thing and did not see them.I hope this is of use to you.
                   gary johnsom
content.summary: Slim bright orange like light

content.detailedDescription:
at about 12:20am july 6, i was smoking a cigarette on my back porch, and noticed what i first thought was the last seconds of a firework in the sky. but rather than "flaming-out" the object remained very bright, and moved slowly through the sky. i went through the house and out the front door so i could continue to watch the object move through the air. after about two minutes on a horizontal path it seem to just vanish.
  this was a very bright object, and seemed to slowly pulsate alternately with white light.
  the sky was overcast, but the object was below the cloud cover.
  i was also aware at the time of an unusual mechanical sound, but didn't right away connect it to the object.
  this was much brighter and more of an orange color than any airplane lights i have seen at night before.
content.summary: I saw a bright red-orange oval moving slowly through the sky.

content.detailedDescription: I went out on the deck late at night to smoke and saw a fireball in the sky to the north. it wasn't moving just appeared to hover in the sky. i watched it wondering what it could be. it was there a couple of minutes then just disappeared. i went inside where my granddaughter was watching tv and told her i had just seen something odd. my first ufo. i was curious and went back out and sure enough it appeared again in the same place but now there were two of them. i told my granddaughter to come and look. reluctantly she did and was amazed at what we were looking at. i told her to go get her dad. both of the fireballs disappeared again but reappeared after a bit. my son saw them as they were reappearing. one of them at one point descended slowly downward and then disappeared behind the tree line. it was visible behind the trees until it went out again. we got the binoculars out but it didn't really help. we watched them come and go four or five times for about an hour. we finally decided they weren't going to do anything except hover and disappear so we went inside. i did look out my bedroom window a couple more times that night but never saw them again.
content.summary: 2 glowing fireballs in the northern sky

content.detailedDescription: I was hanging out with my buddy jason it was july forth. we been playing video games all day and felt the need to go out side and see some fireworks. we walked out my back door and started to look around to spot some.I noticed two red lights for almost 60 seconds and still don't know what they are. i live right by fort know and by a air port an know the dirrence between the two. military craft lights and regular huge 747s.I have a 49 seco d video with 4 blown up imagines and the end result fliped me out , to try and get some answers.The fog from the fire works  ruined my line of sight.I looked at my buddie and asked what to you think that is ? he says ufo without skipping a beat. my ipad stays in my hand so i lucked out being able to have this film and pictures.I walked right back in my house like a little girl. i was honestly scared.....
content.summary: What is it ? never seen anything like that above my sky's . lived here for 22 years, an got hit in the face with this .

content.detailedDescription: A friend dying of cancer revealed to me of a top secret us gov. entity which he belonged to discribed  massive triangle floating "ships" carrying tons of equipment at the edge of space. he stated that these ships could be conected together to form a circle at launch then split up and be positioned anywhere around the planet. he stated that the pilots had to be in spacesuits they flew so high. he asked how i thought that the u.S. could get thousands of tons of arms and equipment anywhere in the world in almost a blink of the eye.... i had no answer. this explains alot of sightings of arrowhead or pie shaped craft. this does not explain the rest of ufo sightings??????????. it is my belief that we as a species would have to be comepletely ignorant to think that we are the only "thinking" species in the universe. i just thought i should repeat what i was told from a man on his deathbed. this is the end of my statement please do not contact me.. it is just food for thought and is in realm of reality.
content.summary: Deathbed statement from friend about secret gov. floatila platforms someone needs to hear this.

content.detailedDescription: Two dark circular objects flying slow overhead. one of the objects disappeared while the other continued to fly out of view. i felt happy when i saw them.
content.summary: Two circular flying objects

content.detailedDescription: While sittining in my kitchen eatting noticed,a star over the mountains of half moon bay. for close to thirty min changing bright colors, then dims to low red light then travels to the left then diapears, tthat was,the first. the next day i looked in the same direction and another light showed but came and just hoovered ther for hours so long that my son and i drove ovet the san mateo bridge to see it close up it was scary. i,have film of that day and other day soon after as imstarted taping it because my family thought i was getting carried away iwith ot all.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Have seen several diffrent shapes and sizes many over s.F. bay close to airports.

content.detailedDescription: I got it on video
content.summary: I got it on video plz cantact me asap

content.detailedDescription: I was outside in my backyard and was engaged cooking on my grill. sitting down on my swing facing south i noticed a small silver dot flying at high altitude from the south at not a greater speed than an aircraft but on a course not noticed on normal flight path of general jet aircraft routinely flying at that altitude. as the unknown was heading toward my position it slowed and hovered. i let my wife know and got a camera. i was able to get photos of the object, some are impressive by any standard, i cropped the image and got a shape of what was witnessed but not close enough for true detail. approximately 3 minutes after 33 photos were taken the object went west slowly at first then gained speed faster than any conventional aircraft i have ever witnessed.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Came from different direction than normal aircraft in distance. high altitude, stopped and hovered, then fly at high rate of speed at 90 degrees westerly

content.detailedDescription:
During attendance at suny at albany between 1973-1974 i was visiting a friend. while in his back yard i looked up and saw a bright white spherical object traveling straight across the horizon. the object moved up to a commercial plane from behind and made a dead stop in front of the plane as to let the pilots see it. immediately after it stopped in front of the plane it then made a right turn (90 degrees) and shot straight up so fast that the object blinked off.
i recounted to my friend what happened as he was putting clothes in his laundry room. 
he his girlfriend and mine all looked at me and said nothing. i was not under any influence of any type of drug or alcohol. around 11:00pm that same night we all we watching television when the news report came on as a news flash that the pilots of that plane reported the ufo sighting. this news report not only shocked my friends but allowed me to live all these years with the peace that i was not imagining what i saw. i tried to search the mufon database but could not find any recorded report although the albany ny new station must still have the archive of the story. is there any way i can find out more about that incident?
unfortunately i only recall that it may have occurred between october 1973-november 1973.
i would appreciate any feedback no matter how limited.
thanking you in advance for your time and consideration.
jp nieves
content.summary: Ultra high speed stopped in front of airplane

content.detailedDescription:
We were at my daughters home to celebrate the 4th. it began to rain and we thought we were not going to be able to view the fireworks displays from the neighborhood.

as we were watching our favorite movie "independance day" (a tradition now since the movie first shown) the rain stopped. before the movie ended we heard neighbors starting to pop their fireworks so we went outside to view the light shows.

as we were looking up into the sky we noticed high above all the activity 3 objects moving in formation (one-behind-one) coming from a southerly direction and moving northerly. they appeared to be moving faster than an airplane moves, and there was no sound coming from them. they were glowing as if there was a flame but the glow was steady, not out of control. as they moved from beneath our direct line-of-sight the glow disappeared but the object which appeared to be black from our line-of-site was still visible.

after a while, some other objects (4) coming from the southern area appeared and moving toward a northeasterly direction (same shapes and glows). my daughter attempted to catch the flights on her smartphone but at the distance of the objects the video did not come out real clear. she still has the video on her cell. others that saw these objects were my husband and my daughter's husband.

shortly after the objects flew over a plane appeared in the distance but not as high as the objects in question and we heard the sound of the plane. the plane was coming from the southeast heading north and it had just missed where our line-of-sight pattern criss-crossed with the objects. then from the south a helicopter came flying overhead and again we heard it and it appeared lower than where we saw the objects  flying. 

we lost sight of the objects as they disappeared from our sight in the distance.
content.summary: Objects moved high & steady across the sky w/flame like shimmer. as they passed overhead the lights disappeared but objects were still visible for awhile.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my family were outside on the 4th of july when we noticed a floating orange light in the sky. this was my 3rd time seeing them so  could tell it was neither a fire work or a plan. we watched the first one and it went up at a diagonal angle slowly then pulsated then disappeared. then we saw another one do the same exact thing. it also disappeared in the same place. then another one came. followed by two more. the last one was bright red. they were all pulsating. and one by one they disappeared. since it was 4th of july everybody was outside. i think my neighbors saw it to cause they were all watching in that direction. it wasnt a fire work or a plane. it could have been a chinese lantern. but like i said i keep seeing these. the first time i reported it. but i didnt the second time. but now that i saw this i thought it needed to be reported. i know other people in my area saw it to so i hope my report will be followed by theirs.
content.summary: We saw 5 lights moving in a straight path for around 5 minutes. they were orange colored but the last one was bright red. they all seemed to disintegrate.

content.detailedDescription: Cleveland ohio, 1210am 7-6-13. saw a green/yellow light with long tail. traveling from n.E. to s.W. moving fast. lasted about 1 second. did anyone else see this?
content.summary: Greenish beam of light with tail. long

content.detailedDescription: I was looking out the window star-gazing across the sky at the big dipper when i noticed a pulsating object. i thought it was a pulsar but it was brighter than the other stars in the sky.  i then noticed that it was moving side to side.  i called my husband upstairs to take a look at it because i thought maybe my eyes were deceiving me.  he looked at it and agreed it was moving side to side and up and down as well as stopping to hover now and then.  we stood there watching it in shock and awe for about five minutes and then it just disappeared.  no trail, no nothing. just poof! gone!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Starlike object hovering, moving side to side and up and down slightly

content.detailedDescription:
1) on glenwood ave and second, on the way to i-20, going to work with my fiancee.
2) straight ahead of us, i  noticed a very shiny object in the sky, in the distance.
3) at first i thought it had to be either a 747 or a large military transport plane, reflecting a large amount of sunlight. it looked like very shiny metal reflecting light.
4) the object at first was moving to the south at a normal speed.  it  suddenly drops perfectly vertically, not in a plane dive fashion,  at least 500 ft. it then shifted to the  left about 500 ft. the craft then started to get smaller, as if it were flying directly away from us. then some word kind of distortion, or haze, in a circle shape, materialized around the craft and it was just gone.
5) disbelief and excitement, i'm a believer but had never actually seen anything i could not explain. scrambling, trying to get my phone to take a video,  i couldn't get it out so i kept my eyes on the craft. 
6) the craft vanished, it didn't fly out of view, it flew into or through something and was gone. the craft had to be massive. larger than any plane.
content.summary: Observed very large craft , drop already 200 ft, stop, and powdered to either take off very fast or dissappear

content.detailedDescription: Me and my mother were watching fireworks display so our eyes where already on the sky...I was on ground level..My mother was on 3rd floor balcony overhead from me..I noticed a red ball in the sky off to my right...Which was northeast direction,i yelled up to my mother on the balcony"do you see that?".She replied "i see it" i knew right away what this was because this was the 3rd year in a row i have witnessed this happen..After watching 1 red light for a few minutes hovering in one spot..A second and third red light caught my attention.(looking to the northwestish)..They were moving in a striaght line just above the treetops...Once they got directly north from our position they simple dissappeared..A few seconds later they appeared again to the northwest..But this time there were 5 objects..They repeated the same movement process several times while everytime this action was repeated the formation gained an object..When the fireworks stopped the lights faded completly not to be seen again...I have seen this same exact event happen 3 years in a row...I will have video set up next year.
content.summary: Multiple objects in the sky,..Several of us seen this event for more than 15 minutes

content.detailedDescription: Maps to accompany report # 48692 "long duration ufo sightings"
content.summary: Maps

content.detailedDescription: My wife and son and i were on our way home from watching the fireworks in downtown fort myers on the 4th of july.  we were on se 1st ter in cape coral traveling west, when at 10:20pm my wife noticed a bright stationary orange light in the northern sky.  i stopped the car and could see the light through the passenger side window.  my wife opened the "star walk" app from her iphone and pointed it in the direction of the light.  the star walk app reported a satellite in the approximate direction.  since we were only a few houses down from our home i quickly drove to our driveway and got out of the car.  the light was now moving west in a straight line about as quickly as a jet.  it appeared to have made a considerable jump from its original position in the sky, but since we were now a few houses down from the original sighting, it is hard to say how much distance it actually traveled.   the light traveled west for a couple of seconds than quickly jerked up and over (what appeared to be up and left) before blinking out.  it should be noted that there were fireworks going off in various parts of the sky as it was prime time for such a display.  i'm sure that there is an explanation for the light, but at this time i cannot explain it.
content.summary: Bright orange light in sky, stationary at first, than moved in straight line before quickly moving up and over than blinking out.

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i was taking a walk in holiday, fl on july 5,2013, it was  before 10pm. when we saw an very bright orange fireball in the sky coming from the east. at first i thought it was a big fire work, but it just kept on going over our heads. we notice it had an irregular shape and it was flying very fast, coming from the east going to the north west, headed to the gulf of mexico. we also noticed it didn't make a sound. we lost sight of it when it went over the tree line. we tried taking a picture of it with our cell phone but it didn't come out very well.
content.summary: We saw an orange fireball in an irregular shape flying overhead going very fast, it didn't make any sounds, it was headed to the gulf of mexico. it went from east to north west.

content.detailedDescription: My husband went outside with his telescope to show me saturn. he came back inside and said there was something strange in the sky. i rushed outside and saw a bright orange somewhat triangle shaped object moving to the west. it was not that high in the sky and made no noise. it didn't have any blinking lights. we watched it until it just disappeared. it didn't fade off into the distance - it just disappeared into thin air. i can say it was not a helicopter - saw and heard one the night before - and it was not a plane. we also noticed that there wasn't any wind or aircraft in the sky at the time of the sighting.
content.summary: Bright orange object flying west of manchester mo

content.detailedDescription: I was watching the tv and saw a very bright red light out the window. at first i thought it might be some sort of firework but it didnt explode and it was traveling horizontaly. i saw two objects approximately 1 minute interval between them. when the third object appeared i grabbed my binoculars and went outside for a better look. the object was bright and moving slowly. there was no sound at all. it was low enough that i'm sure i could hear a sound if it made one. it was lower than any airplanes i see around here. the object was made up of 7 lights in the form of a circle standing on end. i could see that the lights were separate but fairly close together. it went behind some trees but i could see it through them. it made a very abrupt turn to the east and seemed to lose altitude and i lost it in the trees as it got lower. i was very excited to see the object. i have never seen anything like it. i forgot to mention that the object was moving from south to north before it made a turn to the east. also, i could not see a solid object that the lights could have been attached to.
content.summary: Circle of lights standing on end

content.detailedDescription: Was driving home from wal-mart at approx. 2:30 pm seen an cigar shaped object just appear out of no where about 45 degrees from horizon and over a mile high in sky. the object was gleaming a silver color and appeared to have the sun beaming off of it making it visible. the sun was not beaming off of me or the car. the sky was cloudless in this area. it was visible for 30 seconds then became instantly invincible. it was not a reflective object on my window as i stuck my head out window and seen it in sky. i feel as it perhaps had cloaking technology and the sun shining on it is what made it visible and once the sun didn't hit it no more is when it became invisible to my naked eye. i say this because it seemed that it was there but not there. a hologram almost but like i said high in the sky and not from anything in my car as i seen it when i stuck my head out window. the precise location is 30 seconds before the intersection from osawa blvd and shoal line blvd aripeka/spring hill florida.
content.summary: Seen cigar shaped object in sky. sun reflected off of it, was gleaming silver, shone for about 30 seconds, did not move, and simply disappeared. dissappeared as if the sun stopped hitting the object and making it appear. cloaking technlogy exposed?

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 9:40 pm, me, my wife and a neighbor were sitting in my backyard talking.  i observed a very brilliant bright light in the sky.  it seemed to follow a sw to ne path.  it was sighted nw of my home.  object did not resemble any kind of aircraft.  no normal navigation or flashing strobes.  just very bright object.  seen by all 3 of us.  i saw same object 4 separate times over a 20 min time.  object followed same straight line path and area in the sky, maybe 15 to 20 miles away.  each time, i would loose sight of object in trees behind my house.  i am a retired veteran with aviation experience and i felt concerned that i could not identify this object.
content.summary: Bright orange object sighted at dusk

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i was taking a walk in holiday, fl on july 5,2013, it was  before 10pm. when we saw an very bright orange fireball in the sky coming from the east. at first i thought it was a big fire work, but it just kept on going over our heads. we notice it had an irregular shape and it was flying very fast, coming from the east going to the north west, headed to the gulf of mexico. we also noticed it didn't make a sound. we lost sight of it when it went over the tree line. we tried taking a picture of it with our cell phone but it didn't come out very well.
content.summary: We saw an orange fireball in an irregular shape flying overhead going very fast, it didn't make any sounds, it was headed to the gulf of mexico. it went from east to north west.

content.detailedDescription:
I was on the bc ferry to pender island. i was laying on my back on the deck. it was a perfectly clear sky, not one single cloud to be seen, except for one puffy little cloud just above and to the left of the ship, maybe 100 meters out. 

i noticed the cloud was dissipating quickly, and thought it was strange. within ten seconds the cloud was gone. then the cloud started forming again, like mist coming out of a smoke machine. 

i sat up and took out my iphone 4, got the video running and filmed it from my chest while watching the cloud. 

then a small black object came out of the cloud and headed right, to the north. i followed it with my camera until it passed the ship and disappeared. the cloud then dispersed again. 

my video managed to catch the second cloud disappearing. i've watched the video and can't see the ufo on it. i didn't zoom as i couldn't figure out how to do it quickly enough. i've attached the video. 

the ufo was on a direct path towards the mast, or whatever that thing is sticking off the ship to the left. draw a straight line from the tip to the left.
content.summary: Ufo creates cloud and flies out of it

content.detailedDescription: We were watching fireworks from my friends yard, 4 of us.  and saw the first orange glowing sphere quickly moving from south to north.  no sound, constant, steady, and fast.  appeared quite high...Then 2 more followed, each a few minutes apart.  my friend and i were both able to capture the last one on video from our phones.  none of us could determine what it might be.  it faded off into the horizon, beyond our sight.
content.summary: Three different orange glowing spheres on same flight pattern, minutes apart

content.detailedDescription: I was leaving my parents house with two of my children when i noticed a odd colored light in the sky traveling east. i stopped and lety oldest son out to get his friend who was spending the night and pulled forward 50ft to the end of the road to watch the object but didn't see it. i got the two boys into the car and drove around looped around the neighborhood which took approximately 35 seconds at which time we again saw the object but this time flying south directly over my sons friends house at which point i took out my cell phone and started recording the object we were joined by 5 other observers who all saw the object who all noted the lack of sound and the pulsating of the light and watched it until it disappeared at which time i stopped the recording. as we were all standing in the road talking about it my sons friend pointed north and said there's another one which was travelling at a high rate of speed. once it got over the neighborhood it substantially reduced its speed and travelled almost directly overhead headed south i quickly turned on my camera on my phone again. we again heard no noise and noticed that it pulsated like the other object we watched it as i flew over the neighborhood at which point some artillery fireworks went off about a quarter mile from us in the path of the object at which point it came to a complete stop for 5-7 seconds and proceeded in the same direction for another 10 seconds before also disappearing. i do have both video files but am unsure if the will be of any value but will include them
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: two orange lights drifted across the sky over neighborhood

content.detailedDescription:
On the night of 4th of july i was out in front of my house and on the sidewalk with my son and neighbor lighting up sparklers when i noticed what i believed to be a really bright star or a planet, but then realized that in mere minutes it had a trajectory and was moving away from us. 

i first witnessed it facing west and it continued heading in that direction until we lost sight of the bright object. immediately at first seeing it, i called my wife to come out with my cheap sony digital camera and i began snapping away. it was sort of light out when i began but it soon darkened outside. i should point out that with the naked eye, the bright object appeared to be emitting its own light source and it kept flickering and flashing. again, thinking "okay maybe just a star or planet". there was no sound that i heard. it didn't fly away like plane nor did it move like a helicopter. it was just... well, just stationary.

... but looking closely at the photos, i was shocked. this thing appears to have a classic serpent shape of some kind with sentience to it. it is very much alive and flying through the sky and unlike anything i have ever witnessed. it is not a firecracker or the result of fireworks being fired in the sky either... 

my buddy who was with me has never believed in this sort of stuff. after last night, and seeing the photos he now no longer questions whether we are not alone. 

*update, i witnessed the same bright object appear near same sky area and moving towards west. this time i photographed it from my kitchen window.
content.summary: At first believed was a bright star or planet. pulsating and flashing light.
